Prerequisite: Rogue

As a master athlete, you become a rogue of a higher caliber who can surprise adversaries with unbelievable moves and amazing feats of physical stamina while remaining true to your roots as a thief or a scoundrel.

(10/4/2011)

Updated in Class Compendium.

CAT BURGLAR PATH FEATURES

Acrobatic Action (11th level)

When you spend an action point to take an extra action, you also gain an extra move action that you must use this turn.

Body Control (11th level)

Whenever you are affected by a pull, a push, or a slide, you can move 1 less square than the effect specifies.

Athletic Master (16th level)

Roll twice whenever you make an Athletics check. Use whichever result you prefer.
